reviews.review_text: Best earphone ever.You can hear sounds of other world and may think that you are hearing extra terrestial sounds.The Bass of the headphone is ultimate.

reviews.review_header: Increase the price to my standard
reviews.review_text: The price is not of my standard.Plz increase the price and enhance the quality..Very bad.........

I sold my wife to buy this now i can sleep properly ... you can even hears singers heart beat from it.. and moreover it have 498 km long wire so u can keep this in ur home and start playing song in office.
After buying this you won't need any car.  Because these will drive you crazy straight to the mental hospital

reviews.review_header: Great headphones, you can listen to song which you ...
reviews.review_text: Great headphones, you can listen to song which you don't even have on your mobile phone or computer. Even dogs start dancing after listening from these. These are multipurpose headphones which can also work as a vcuum cleaner and you can play cricket with them too.

What should I say.....it's just top of the world..when I told my mother to buy me these she said sure son....when I heard these with bass turned full they bursted my eardrums and I m deaf now....just try these once u won't need any headsets in ur life and ya my dog did hip hop on these headsets

From the name itself u can feel the hidden charm of this product. HIFIMAN u r genious. This Headphone made my life. It has everything u need in daily life. Well it can help u find u gf too. Yes the investment of a kidney is for sure.Love u HIFIMAN. Just mail me about the update version when it comes so that i could tell my doctor to remove my 2nd kidney and eyes too. Well what is in the EYE when you have HIFI . that is the motto. Dont think twice.Buy it now by selling any of ur body parts cause this headphonecan  change ur L-I-F-E.

I am a professional gamer, so I brought these headphones to use with my xbox.To be honest these are the best sound gear I've used for gaming.after using these,my gaming abilities have increased ten folds.Now I am the high scorer in subway surfers, temple run,and candy crush.i feel so complete.

reviews.review_header: The best headphones in the market are up for sale
reviews.review_text: The best headphones in the market are up for sale. And the best thing about buying these headphones is that they are giving a discount on these headphones. A discount of 2000 rs, like that will help us to buy it(huh). After buying these headphones u may have to think where to use it, guess what a 1k headphones does the same job that these headphones do. With an emi of 18k they should also give an insurance atleast my car has an insurance and my car's speakers are better than these headphones.But totally worth buying.When i get old my child will inherit these headphones
